DNS Logs","fontColor":"#ffffff"}},"viz_N4uMWUf8":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"## Remote SA Connections","fontColor":"#ffffff"}},"viz_DeLOXRqp":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"## Software Connections","fontColor":"#ffffff"}},"viz_dhcvouu5":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"## File Hash Matches","fontColor":"#ffffff"}},"viz_xuzbKtvK":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"## Account Stacking","fontColor":"#ffffff"}},"viz_IP_Mapping":{"type":"splunk.linkgraph","options":{"backgroundColor":"transparent","showValueCounts":false,"nodeWidth":120},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_xcD5Qx3Z"},"title":"","showProgressBar":false,"showLastUpdated":false,"eventHandlers":[{"type":"drilldown.setToken","options":{"tokens":[{"token":"port","key":"row.<fieldname>.value"}]}}]},"viz_m7fS8Sb4":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"## Network Connections
","fontColor":"#ffffff"}}},"dataSources":{"ds_68kLTIXT":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"$base_query$
$sort$
| rename All_Traffic.src_ip as "Source IP" 
| rename All_Traffic.dest_ip as "Destination IP"
| rename All_Traffic.dest_port as "Port"
| lookup network_topology_lookup ip as "Destination IP" Output location as dest_location
| lookup network_topology_lookup ip as "Source IP" Output location as src_location
| fillnull value="external" src_location, dest_location
| iplocation "Destination IP" 
| fillnull value="N/A" Country
| search dest_location = $location$ Port=$port$
Country="$country$"
| table "Destination IP", Country Port count,

"},"name":"Outgoing Traffic"},"ds_1m9XLlVY":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_68kLTIXT","query":"| stats count by Country
| fields - count"},"name":"Search By Country"},"ds_ZdK4UylX":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats count from datamodel=Network_Traffic Where All_Traffic.dest_ip="$ip$" OR All_Traffic.src_ip="$ip$" groupby All_Traffic.src_ip All_Traffic.dest_ip All_Traffic.dest_port
$sort$
| rename All_Traffic.src_ip as "Source IP" 
| rename All_Traffic.dest_ip as "Destination IP"
| rename All_Traffic.dest_port as "Port"
| lookup network_topology_lookup ip as "Destination IP" Output location as dest_location
| lookup network_topology_lookup ip as "Source IP" Output location as src_location
| fillnull value="external" src_location, dest_location
| iplocation "Destination IP" 
| fillnull value="N/A" Country","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time.earliest$","latest":"$global_time.latest$"}},"name":"ChainSearch_NetworkTraffic"},"ds_xcD5Qx3Z":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_ZdK4UylX","query":"$network_direction$"},"name":"Network_Traffic_With_Direction"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}},"tokens":{"default":{"port":{"value":"*"}}}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"-24h@h,now"},"title":"Global Time Range"},"input_IP":{"options":{"defaultValue":"","token":"ip"},"title":"IP Address","type":"input.text"},"input_location":{"options":{"items":[{"label":"All","value":"*"},{"label":"Internal","value":"internal"},{"label":"External","value":"external"}],"defaultValue":"*","token":"location"},"title":"Dropdown Input Title","type":"input.dropdown"},"input_V7pBpEEd":{"options":{"defaultValue":"*","token":"port"},"title":"Port","type":"input.text"},"input_IKvb5yHQ":{"options":{"defaultValue":"*","token":"country"},"title":"Country","type":"input.text"},"input_eS6O33EH":{"options":{"items":[{"label":"No Sorting","value":"```MyComment```"},{"label":"Ascending","value":"| sort - count | head 50"},{"label":"Descending","value":"| sort count | head 50"}],"defaultValue":"```MyComment```","token":"sort"},"title":"Sort","type":"input.dropdown"},"input_NetworkDirection":{"options":{"items":[{"label":"Outgoing","value":"| search dest_location = $location$ Port=$port$ "Source IP"="$ip$" Country="$country$" | table "Destination IP", Country Port count"},{"label":"Incoming","value":"| search src_location = $location$ Port=$port$ "Destination IP"="$ip$" Country="$country$" | table "Source IP", Country Port count"}],"defaultValue":"| search dest_location = $location$ Port=$port$ "Source IP"="$ip$" Country="$country$" | table "Destination IP", Country Port count","token":"network_direction"},"title":"Network Direction","type":"input.dropdown"}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"backgroundImage":{"sizeType":"contain","x":0,"y":0,"src":"/static/app/lame_analysis_security_app/Two-tone-blue.png"},"backgroundColor":"#1434A4","showTitleAndDescription":false,"display":"auto-scale"},"structure":[{"item":"viz_IP_Mapping","type":"block","position":{"x":300,"y":60,"w":860,"h":640}},{"item":"viz_xuzbKtvK","type":"block","position":{"x":100,"y":340,"w":250,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_DeLOXRqp","type":"block","position":{"x":60,"y":220,"w":250,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_iB37vYwR","type":"block","position":{"x":60,"y":50,"w":250,"h":45}},{"item":"viz_lblNetworkConnection","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":44,"w":270,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_AboutDashboardImage","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":30,"h":30}},{"item":"viz_AboutDashboard","type":"block","position":{"x":40,"y":0,"w":220,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_SearchForDashboards","type":"block","position":{"x":960,"y":0,"w":200,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_lblSoftwareConnections","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":220,"w":270,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_lblAccountLogins","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":335,"w":270,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_SzMthOnT","type":"block","position":{"x":110,"y":100,"w":250,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_N4uMWUf8","type":"block","position":{"x":50,"y":160,"w":280,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_dhcvouu5","type":"block","position":{"x":80,"y":280,"w":250,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_SvA0Ws8D","type":"block","position":{"x":100,"y":400,"w":250,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_lblDNSLogs","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":90,"w":270,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_lblRemoteSAConnections","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":156,"w":270,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_lblFileHashMatches","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":275,"w":270,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_lblLogStacking","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":395,"w":270,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_SearchForDashboardButton","type":"block","position":{"x":1170,"y":0,"w":30,"h":30}},{"item":"viz_m7fS8Sb4","type":"block","position":{"x":510,"y":0,"w":220,"h":40}}],"globalInputs":["input_global_trp","input_NetworkDirection","input_IP","input_location","input_V7pBpEEd","input_IKvb5yHQ","input_eS6O33EH"]},"description":"soc_network_connections","title":"SOC Network Connections"}
